briefTitle: Metabolic and Bone Changes After Adjuvant Cancer Treatments in Early Non-metastatic Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Metabolic and Bone Changes After Adjuvant Cancer Treatments in Early Non-metastatic Breast Cancer - a 5-year Follow-up Study.
conditions: Bone Fracture, Glucose, High Blood, Insulin Resistance, Blood Pressure, High, Cholesterolemia
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Postmenopausal
* Breast cancer stage I-III
* Eligible to receive (neo-)adjuvant chemotherapy/other antineoplastic treatment

Exclusion Criteria:

* Prior malignancy
* Metabolic disease (diabetes mellitus etc)
